name: Capital Cities v1.2
description:
Want to learn about your capital cities in a fun and enjoyable way? Look no further. 3 Choices. 3 Flags. 3 Lives.

Capital Cities is an educational game currently in development,  created by TiltedAngle. You get three flags and one capital city for each question. You must match the capital city to the flag of the country it is in. If you get one question wrong, you lose a life. If you lose all three lives, the game is over.

1.3 is out! Click here What's new
  • Changed Homescreen Logo
  • Added Itch Description
  • Removed curved stars
  • Fixed Bhutan's flag
  • Israel's capital city is now Tel Aviv (not Jerusalem)
  • End screen updated

Released on 1st June

Play older versions

Version 1.1 (The Flag Update)

Changelog: 30 flags added, mainly Islands and Africa

Version 1

Changelog: Released with 60 easy flags and basic mechanics.
